about_the_game:
Begin the ride of your life with the Elite Riders Pack and receive an exclusive mount, early access, a special title and much more!

With the exception of the Ellun box, all items will be awarded to each character on the purchasing player’s account. The Ellun Box will be awarded to the first character created on the purchasing player’s account.

The Elite Riders Pack includes:
* 7-Day Open Beta Head Start
* Closed Beta Access
* Mount: Amethyst Wolf
* Topaz Wolf Skin
* Ellun Box (50)
* Title: Hakanas Honorguard
* 100% Health Recovery Potion Box (20)
* 100% Mana Recovery Potion Box (20)
detailed_description:
Elite Riders Pack


About the Game

Begin the ride of your life with the Elite Riders Pack and receive an exclusive mount, early access, a special title and much more!

With the exception of the Ellun box, all items will be awarded to each character on the purchasing player’s account. The Ellun Box will be awarded to the first character created on the purchasing player’s account.

The Elite Riders Pack includes:
* 7-Day Open Beta Head Start
* Closed Beta Access
* Mount: Amethyst Wolf
* Topaz Wolf Skin
* Ellun Box (50)
* Title: Hakanas Honorguard
* 100% Health Recovery Potion Box (20)
* 100% Mana Recovery Potion Box (20)

name: Riders of Icarus: Elite Riders Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista (SP2) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 @ 3.3GHz or higher / AMD A8-5500 @3.3GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260 (1GB) or better / Radeon HD 7670 (1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16-bit Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3GHz or higher / AMD FX-6200 @3.3GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1GB) or better / Radeon HD 6870 (1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16-bit Sound Card

short_description: Begin the ride of your life with the Elite Riders Pack and receive an exclusive mount, early access, a special title and much more! With the exception of the Ellun box, all items will be awarded to each character on the purchasing player’s account.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support
